m_szDocTitle: 10 Questions On Hydrogen Fuel-Cell Cars To Ask Toyota, Honda & Hyundai
m_szDocSumamry: 10 Questions On Hydrogen Fuel-Cell Cars To Ask Toyota, Honda & Hyundai Email This Page To (separate emails with commas) Message (optional) Your email was sent successfully. Close 20,915 views Oct 16, 2014 Follow John Enlarge Photo Within the next two years, three different hydrogen fuel-cell vehicles will be offered to California buyers in small numbers. The 2015 Hyundai Tucson Fuel Cell has been available to lease since June, and journalists will be able to drive the new Toyota fuel-cell vehicle in November, just before the Los Angeles Auto Show. That Toyota will hit the market roughly a year
